gobblin.runtime.std

Class JobExecutionStateListeners

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.std.JobExecutionStateListeners
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobExecutionStateListener, JobExecutionStateListenerContainer, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class JobExecutionStateListeners
extends Object
implements JobExecutionStateListener, JobExecutionStateListenerContainer, Closeable
    A helper class to maintain a list of JobExecutionStateListener instances. It itself implements the JobExecutionStateListener interface so all calls are dispatched to the children listeners.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gobblin.runtime.api.JobExecutionStateListener

        JobExecutionStateListener.MetadataChangeCallback, JobExecutionStateListener.StageTransitionCallback, JobExecutionStateListener.StatusChangeCallback

      • registerWeakStateListener

        public void registerWeakStateListener(JobExecutionStateListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: JobExecutionStateListenerContainer
        Like JobExecutionStateListenerContainer.registerStateListener(JobExecutionStateListener) but it will create a weak reference. The implementation will automatically remove the listener registration once the listener object gets GCed.

        Note that weak listeners cannot be removed using JobExecutionStateListenerContainer.unregisterStateListener(JobExecutionStateListener).

        Specified by:
        registerWeakStateListener in interface JobExecutionStateListenerContainer

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
